meanings.definition: Yellowfins: the yellowfin tuna, a type of fish known for its yellow fins.
meanings.sent1: The yellowfins swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I love to eat yellowfins because they are so delicious.
meanings.sent3: The yellowfins decided to start a band underwater.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as bright as a school of yellowfins.
meanings.sent5: The yellowfins shimmered like gold in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Yellowfins: the yellow fins of a fish, specifically the yellowfin tuna.
meanings.sent1: The fisherman admired the vibrant yellowfins of the tuna.
meanings.sent2: The yellowfins of the tuna stood out against the blue water.
meanings.sent3: The yellowfins of the tuna were jealous of the red fins.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the yellowfins of a tuna.
meanings.sent5: The yellowfins of the tuna glowed like lanterns in the dark sea.
